English:
For each stack of Amnesia, ATK +3% and Critical Rate +3%.
When Amnesia stacks are 6 or more, bonuses are doubled. Each time Amnesia stacks increase, gain 1 additional stack. All skills ignore Taunt.
When Amnesia reaches 10, enter Sleepwalking until stacks are reduced to 0.
Chinese:
每有1层失忆，攻击力+3%，暴击率+3%
当失忆层数不少于6时，翻倍加成，失忆层数增加时额外获得1层,所有技能无视嘲讽.
失忆达到10时，进入梦游，直到失忆层数清0为止。

English: Cannot act. Removed when Amnesia stacks are reduced to 0.
Chinese: 无法行动，失忆清0时解除。

English: Increases damage taken by 2% per stack of debuffs on the inflicter.
Chinese: 根据施加者的减益层数使受到伤害增加，每有1层使受到伤害增加2%。

English: At the end of the turn, remove this effect and draw cards until hand size equals Amnesia stacks (max 6).
Chinese: 回合结束时，解除此效果，将手牌抽到与失忆层数相同。（最多抽至6张）

English:
Whenever an Investigator is inflicted with a debuff, take &a damage.
Each time Amnesia exceeds 6 stacks, duration increases by 1 turn.
Chinese:
每当有调查员被施加减益效果，受到&a点伤害。
每当失忆突破6，持续时间增加1回合.

English:
Can use skills while unable to act.
When this effect is removed, take 3 Pain damage for each stack of Amnesia gained during this effect (total once).
Incoming damage: &a
Chinese:
自身可以在无法行动时使用技能。
此效果解除时，在此效果期间每获得过一层失忆，受到3痛苦伤害（只结算总和）。
即将受到的伤害：&a

English: When gaining Amnesia, draw a Redemption from the discard pile/deck, reduce its cost by 1, then remove this effect.
Chinese: 获得失忆时，从弃牌堆/牌库中抽取一个救赎令其打出前的费用-1然后解除此效果。

English:
Amnesia cap becomes 9.
When Amnesia stacks are 6 or more, gain 1 Mana at the start of each turn and prioritize drawing a personal skill.
Chinese:
失忆上限变为9.
失忆层数不少于6时，每回合开始时获得1点法力，优先抽取一个自身的技能。

English:
For each stack of Amnesia gained in this area, Max HP +1 (including pre-buff gains).
Each time a non-Retrospect skill is used, ATK +1 this turn.
When healed, another random ally heals for the same amount.
Chinese:
本区域内每获得过1层失忆，最大生命值增加1（包括获得增益之前的）
每次使用非回忆技能，使本回合的攻击力+1。
受到治疗时，使随机一个其他友军获得等量治疗。

English:
Can use 1 skill per turn while unable to act.
Excess Amnesia deals 2 damage to a random unit. While Sleepwalking, each time Amnesia changes for the first time each turn, cast a random exclusive skill (excluding Unique skills).
Remove this buff when Sleepwalking ends.
Current: &a
Chinese:
每回合可以在无法行动状态下使用一个技能，溢出的失忆会对随机单位造成2点伤害。
处于梦游时，每回合失忆首次变化时，随机释放一个专属技能(唯一技能的同名技能除外)。
解除梦游时，同时解除此增益。
当前：&a

English: Only effective when only Weakness or Disruption debuffs are present.
Chinese: 仅存在弱化或干扰减益时生效。

English: Removed at the end of the turn.

Chtholly fights at the cost of her memories.
After using a non-Retrospect skill, gain 1 stack of Amnesia.
Using a Retrospect skill reduces Amnesia by 1 stack.
Chinese:
珂朵莉战斗以记忆为代价。
释放珂朵莉的非回忆技能后，获得1层失忆。
使用回忆技能时，减少1层失忆。

English:
The Happiest Girl in the World

Chtholly possesses strong physical output and Pain debuffs, but must carefully manage Amnesia.
Chinese:
世界上最幸福的女孩

珂朵莉拥有强大物理输出和痛苦减益，但作为代价，需要注意控制失忆的程度。

English: If the wearer is under a Weakness or Disruption debuff, Weakness/Disruption resistance +300%.
Chinese: 装备者若正受到弱化或干扰减益，弱化和干扰抵抗+300%。

English: After the wearer is debuffed, damage taken this turn -25%.
Chinese: 装备者受到减益后，本回合受到伤害-25%。

English: Deal 40% increased damage to Pharos enemies.
Chinese: 对法洛斯敌人造成的伤害增加40%

English:
At combat start, grant the ally with the lowest HP 1 stack of Debuff Resistance.
Each turn, the first time an ally is debuffed, gain 1 Mana.

----Witness
Chinese:
战斗开始时，使生命值最低的一个友军获得1层“抵抗减益”的增益。
我方每回合首次受到减益时，获得1点法力.

----见证

English: At the end of each turn, heal 4 HP to Investigators debuffed this turn.
Chinese: 每回合结束时，为本回合受到过减益的调查员回复4点体力。

English: Retrospect Can be used while unable to act. If Amnesia stacks are 5 or fewer, lose 2 additional stacks. Can use skills while unable to act this turn.
Chinese: 回忆 处于无法行动时也可以使用。 当失忆层数不超过5时，额外失去2层。 本回合可以在无法行动状态使用技能。

English:
When cast, if Amnesia stacks are not 10 or 0, you may attack up to 2 additional times (random targets). Each extra attack grants 1 Amnesia.
If this causes Amnesia to reach 10, Exclude this skill.
Chinese:
释放时，如果失忆层数不为10且不为0，可以选择额外攻击至多2次（目标随机），每次额外攻击获得1层失忆。
然后如果因此效果失忆变为10，放逐此技能。

English: When Amnesia stacks are 3 or more, this skill ignores Taunt, gains Swiftness, Critical and Tracking, and draws a skill.
Chinese: 失忆层数不少于3时，此技能无视嘲讽，变为迅速，获得致命和追踪，使用时抽取一个技能。

English:
Using this skill does not increase Amnesia.
If current Amnesia ≤5, double stacks; otherwise increase up to 10.
Chinese:
此技能释放后不会增加失忆。
如果当前失忆层数不超过5，翻倍当前层数；否则最多增加到10.

English: Retrospect Reveal 3 non-Retrospect exclusive skills, then choose one to cast. If Amnesia was ≥2 before casting and higher after, add the chosen skill to hand.
Chinese: 回忆 展示自身的3个非回忆的专属技能，然后选择一个释放。 如果使用此技能前失忆层数不少于2且在释放选择的技能后层数更多，将选择的技能拿在手里。

English:
Deal +&a damage per Amnesia stack.
After hitting, if target's HP is below 1/10 of damage dealt, reduce their HP to 0.
If Amnesia is ≤5, increase to 5.
Current bonus: &b
Chinese:
每有1层失忆,伤害增加&a点.
命中后,若目标剩余体力低于本次造成的伤害的1/10,将其体力变为0.
如果有失忆但不超过5层，将失忆提升至5层。
当前额外伤害：&b

English: If no Retrospect skills are in hand, apply 1 stack of Death's Erosion to all enemies.
Chinese: 手上没有回忆技能时，额外为所有敌人施加一层死亡侵蚀。

English: Retrospect Add "Retrospect" effect to 2 random skills in discard/deck/hand. (Retrospect: Treated as Retrospect; returns to hand if not Excluded; removed after play)
Chinese: 回忆 为弃牌堆，手牌，牌库中随机2个自身的技能增加”回眸“效果。 （回眸：视为回忆技能;释放后若未被放逐，将其拿回手牌;打出后解除）

English: Deal Pain damage equal to each enemy's debuff damage per Amnesia stack. Reduce ally debuff durations by 1 turn. Take 2 Pain damage.
Chinese: 根据自身当前的失忆层数，每一层使所有敌人受到等同于其每回合减益伤害的痛苦伤害，使我方的减益持续时间减少1回合，使自身受到2点痛苦伤害。

English:
Unique
When unable to act, add this skill to hand from discard/deck.
Grants "Unyielding Resolve".
Can be used while unable to act.
Chinese:
唯一
当自身陷入无法行动状态时将此技能从弃牌堆/牌库中加入手牌。
给予自身“愈战愈勇”
处于无法行动也可以使用。

English:
Draw two skills.
Triggers while Chtholly is alive:
Choose: Reminisce (Lose 2 Amnesia)/Forget (Gain 2 Amnesia).
Chinese:
抽取两个技能
珂朵莉存活时触发以下效果
选择：追忆(失去2失忆。)/忘却(增加2失忆。)。

English:
Draw two skills.
If Chtholly is unable to act, she can use skills while unable to act this turn.
Chinese:
抽取两个技能
如果珂朵莉处于无法行动状态，本回合令其可以在无法行动状态下使用技能。

English: Retrospect, Unique Can be used while unable to act. Reset Amnesia to 0, prioritize drawing 3 personal skills, gain "Carved in Memory".
Chinese: 回忆,唯一 处于无法行动时也可以使用。 失忆层数归0，优先抽取3个自身的技能,自身获得“刻骨铭心”增益

English:
Cannot be used.
If Sleepwalking at combat start, Exclude this skill, reset Amnesia, and gain Reversal of Fate.
Draw this skill when entering Death's Door.
When in hand and attacked while in Death's Door, Exclude this skill, prevent damage, reset Amnesia, fully heal, and gain Reversal of Fate.
Current zone Amnesia: &a
Chinese:
无法使用。
如果战斗开始时自身处于梦游，放逐此技能，失忆层数归0然后获得扭转乾坤。
自身进入濒死时从弃牌堆/牌库中抽取此技能。
在手上时，当自身于濒死状态受到攻击时放逐此技能，然后防止伤害，失忆层数归0，回复所有体力，获得扭转乾坤.
当前区域的失忆数：&a；

English:
Unique
Restore all Mana, clear Overload, increase Amnesia by 10 (stops upon Sleepwalking).
Attack +1 time per skill in hand.
Grants "Astral Form".
Chinese:
唯一
回复所有法力，清除所有过载，失忆层数增加10(出现梦游后立刻停止)。
手上每有一个自身技能，额加攻击1次。
给予自身“星神形态”

English: When no other Lucy skills are in hand, draw 3 skills; otherwise draw 2.
Chinese: 当手上没有其它露西技能时，抽取3个技能，否则抽取2个技能。

English:
Draw 4 skills.
Discard any Lucy skills.
Chinese:
抽取4个技能；
丢弃其中的露西技能。

English: When Chtholly has ≥2 Amnesia, cost -1; ≥6 stacks, cost -3 instead.
Chinese: 珂朵莉的失忆不少于2时，费用-1；当珂朵莉的记忆不少于6时，改为费用-3.
费用不少于1的攻击技能。

English: When Chtholly isn't Sleepwalking, damage +30%; else, reduce Amnesia by 2.
Chinese: 珂朵莉未处于梦游时，伤害+30%；否则，减少2失忆.

English: This skill is treated as Retrospect; returns to hand if not Excluded; removed after play.
Chinese: 此技能视为回忆技能；释放后若未被放逐，重新拿回手上；打出后解除。

English: After first use each combat, subsequent uses/casts of same-named skills instead cast random exclusive skills (excluding Unique/same-named skills).
Chinese: 每次战斗第一次使用后，之后使用或释放同名技能均改为释放自身的随机专属技能。（带有唯一的技能及其同名技能除外）

English: After first use each combat, subsequent uses/casts of same-named skills cast random exclusive skills (excluding Unique skills).
Chinese: 此技能每次战斗第一次使用后，之后使用或释放同名技能均改为释放自身的随机专属技能（带有唯一的技能除外).
